text: Road Radio is a 1995 album by Skydiggers. ==Track listing== # "Maple Syrup Song" – 0:51 (Finlayson/Maize) # "Toss & Turn" – 2:53 (P.Cash) # "Alice Graham" – 3:01 (Finlayson/Maize) # "Drive Away" – 4:03 (P.Cash) # "Radio Waves" – 2:33 (Macey/Chambers/Skydiggers) # "What Do You See?" – 2:54 (P.Cash/A.Cash) # "It's a Pity" – 4:53 (Finlayson/Maize) # "You've Got a Lot of Nerve" – 3:37 (A.Cash) # "Down in the Hole" – 4:23 (Finlayson/Maize) # "Long Long Time" – 3:23 (Finlayson/Maize) # "Endless Grey Night" – 4:35 (P.Cash) # "Even When You Fall" – 4:05 (Finlayson/Maize) # "Perch Platter" – 0:40 (Skydiggers) # "Just Another Day" – 2:55 (P.Cash) Category:1995 albums Category:Skydiggers albums
